name: Troels Bjerre Sørensen
content: Troels Bjerre Lund Troels Bjerre Lund (f. Sørensen) Home Publications CV Quotes Code Associate Professor at the Computer Science Department at the IT-University of Copenhagen Rued Langgaards Vej 7 DK-2300 København S Office: 4B.04 Phone: +45 72 18 51 42 Email: The two first letter of my first name and the two first letters of my middle name (at) itu dot dk PhD, Aarhus University, 2008 Research interests: Algorithmic Game Theory, Equilibrium Computation, Equilibrium Refinements, Computational Social Choice, Mechanism Design, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning. Program committee work: AAMAS ( '22 SPC, '15, '12), SAGT ( '21, '16), IJCAI ( '19 SPC, '16, '13), AAAI ( '18, '17, '15, '14, '12, '10), EC ( '17, '14, '12), WINE ( '15, '11), YR-ICALP'14, Organizing committee work: ICALP ( '14, '12), YR-ICALP'14
